EmailTemplate.subject: Expanding mental healthcare for a happier, more-engaged workforce
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Partner Essentials FEATURED The importance of a diversified mental healthcare offering With the demands on our mental health system only increasing, mental health coaching is getting more attention as an effective way to increase capacity and access to quality care. In recognition of Mental Health Awareness Month, we wanted to share our most recent Virtual Care Connections series <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/audio/virtual-care-connections-mental-health-coaching/?utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=email &utm_content=tpa&utm_campaign=may-tpa-partner-essentials]]> in which Dr. Julia Hoffman, Head of Mental Health Strategy at Teladoc Health, explains what mental health coaching is and how it’s proving to be as effective as traditional forms of therapy. Hear more <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/audio/virtual-care-connections-mental-health-coaching/?utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=email &utm_content=tpa&utm_campaign=may-tpa-partner-essentials]]> EVENTS Forum 2022 <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/?utm_source=partner-essentials-may&utm_medium=email&utm_content=channel&utm_campaign=forum-22]]> July 20–22, 2022 | Boston, MA and Virtual
Registration is open! <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/?utm_source=partner-essentials-may&utm_medium=email&utm_content=channel&utm_campaign=forum-22]]> Now that virtual care has gone mainstream, it’s time to go beyond. Come together with change-makers from around the world in person in Boston, or virtually from wherever you are and join the world's largest community dedicated to advancing virtual care. RESOURCES Mental Health Research Report: Consumer Experience with Mental Health Services <[[https://view.highspot.com/viewer/627c25f8f99b8cca9e8e7206]]> This report explores opportunities to increase access to a full spectrum of mental health needs while delivering a highly valued consumer experience. Member Story <[[https://view.highspot.com/viewer/627c273b5d4f3533a79b02fe]]> Hear firsthand how Jason was able to quickly and easily get the mental health services he needed during COVID‑19 isolation. White Paper: A New Era in Mental Healthcare Delivery <[[https://view.highspot.com/viewer/627c2826c548acb9825175ec]]> With mental health care already a critical need, the pandemic saw a surge in demand for services and pushed the need for virtual mental healthcare options. Survey Research: 2022 Emerging Trends in Healthcare <[[https://www.wtwco.com/en-US/News/2022/04/employers-to-tackle-employee-healthcare-affordability-amid-rising-costs]]> In newly released survey findings from Willis Towers Watson, U.S. employers say managing healthcare benefit costs will be their top priority, followed by enhancing mental health benefits. Visit our Mental Health Hub <[[https://teladochealth.com/virtual-mental-health/?utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=email &utm_content=tpa&utm_campaign=may-tpa-partner-essentials]]> Visit this online destination to learn more about our comprehensive, whole‑person approach to mental healthcare.
